name: Graveyard Shift - Early Test Release
description:
Welcome to Graveyard Shift!

Play as a time-travelling zombie that goes back in time to save people from unsavoury early ends. Also, bring back those same people as undead - consentually - to help in an undead revolution! Neat!

However, this game is still being developed, and as of yet, the first conversation isn't even finished being written. But if you want to try out a game-in-progress, go for it!

Also, please leave comments or get in touch with bugs, typos, and issues you find! Especially if they seem non-obvious.
